name: earnings_trend
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stock_analysis.
Tool description: Get company basic financials such as earnings, margin, P/E ratio, 52-week high/low,  dividend information, etc. This API also returns analysts' earnings estimates, upgrades, and downgrades.  
API description: Retrieves the earnings trend for a given stock ticker using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which the earnings trend is to be retrieved.
